constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 168, Number 33 (Friday, February 18, 2022)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SCOTT of Virginia:
H.R. 6793.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8, Clause 3 of the Constitution.
[Page H1133]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

title: To amend title 28, United States Code, to include a Federal Public or Community Defender as a nonvoting member of the United States Sentencing Commission, and for other purposes.
